mapper.select: select menuno, menusal, menusajin, menuname, s_num sNum from menu
select menuno, menusal, menusajin, menuname, s_num sNum from menu where s_num=#{sNum}
select menuno, menusal, menusajin, menuname, s_num sNum from menu where menuno=#{menuno} and rownum=1
mapper.insert:
select menu_seq.nextval from dual
insert into menu(menuno, menusal, menusajin, menuname, s_num) values (#{menuno},#{menusal},#{menusajin, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{menuname},#{sNum})
mapper.update:
update menu
menusal=#{menusal}, menusajin=#{menusajin}, menuname=#{menuname},
where menuno=#{menuno} and rownum=1
mapper.delete: delete from menu where menuno=#{menuno} and rownum=1
